attributes.action: We demand a public, televised EU debate between David Cameron and Nigel Farage.
attributes.background: There is a lot of propaganda regarding the forthcoming EU referendum and the public are understandably confused. The public need to see the views held by the Prime Minister tested by the main opponent, Nigel Farage.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. It would be up to television companies to arrange a debate and to invite people to attend.
